title: Do not worry if you missed fasting the 6 days of shawwal!Same reward can be gained...
transcript: was about the six days of sha and he says if we have Miss days from Ramadan can we make up or do we have to make up for these M days and then follow that with six days of shaal or can we uh uh put the six days first and then later on in the year we make up for the M days of of of Ramadan what are you after when you want to fast the six days of shaal what are you after everyone says well we're after the great Dua where the Prophet Alat the great reward that is where the Prophet Alam told us that whoever fast Ramadan and follows that with six days of sha Allah would reward him as if he fasted the whole year so this is what you want fasting the whole year the reward so if you want this go back to the basics what is the Hadith the prophet says whoever fasts Ramadan the whole complete Ramadan and then follows that with six days of shaal Allah would reward him the fasting of a whole year now if you missed three days due to traveling or due to being ill or if if it's a female due to her menis and she missed these three four days if she finishes Ramadan and wants to begin with the six days of sha would this apply to her the answer is no why because the prophet said whoever fasts Ramadan and this sister fasted only 27 or 26 days she missed four days or three days so in this case in order for her to be rewarded she has to make up for the M days of Ramadan and then afterwards fast the six days of sha this is a specific incident regarding to the Hadith and the understanding of the Hadith as well
